alert.note: Alert for Stafford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 11:19PM CDT until July 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Stafford County in south central Kansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1118 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ellinwood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Stafford County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
